sentences.sContent: a storyteller with an incredible imagination
sentences.sCn: 想象力极丰富的讲故事者

sentences.sContent: It does not take much imagination to understand their grief.
sentences.sCn: 不难想象他们是多么悲伤。

sentences.sContent: With a little imagination, you can find great inexpensive gifts.
sentences.sCn: 稍微动点脑筋，你就会找到物美价廉的礼物。

sentences.sContent: These people do exist; they’re not figments of my imagination.
sentences.sCn: 这些人确实存在，他们不是我凭空想象出来的。

sentences.sContent: ...and the social hierarchy was now based on imagination and creativity...

phrases.pCn: 只是幻觉；只是我的幻想

words.tran: 虚构的；富于想像的；有创造力的

trans.tranOther: the ability to form pictures or ideas in your mind
